com.esri.mo2.ui.qry
Class QueryBuilderLight

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--com.esri.mo2.ui.qry.QueryBuilderLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessible, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable
public class QueryBuilderLight
extends JPanel

This class provides a light, but yet complete query builder. It supports all basic elements of a query builder user interface and can be used to build more complicated and feature-rich components like QueryBuilder.

See Also:
QueryBuilder, Serialized Form
